蒮字的基本解释

蒮
yù
山韭。

蒮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yù］
［《廣韻》余六切，入屋，來。］
生长在山中的韭。

蒮字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蒮； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1049第26
【唐韻】余六切，音育。【爾雅·釋草】蒮，山韭。【疏】韭生山中者名蒮。　又通薁。【王應麟·詩攷】六月食鬱及蒮。出《韓詩》及《爾雅疏》。　又【唐韻古音】引《詩》食鬱及蒮，叶去聲，音奧，統下菽、棗、稻爲一韻。

蒮字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蒮字的起名意思

暂无。

Juan

Juan
yù
Mountain leek.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yù］
["Guangyun" Yu Liuqie, enter the house, come. ]
Chives growing in the mountains.
Juan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　蒮; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1049 Page 26
[Tang Yun] Yu Liuqie, music education. 【Erya·Shuicao】Juan, mountain allium. 【Sparse】The name of the person in the mountain is Jou.　Tong Zou again. 【Wang Yinglin·Poems】Junk Food Depression and Pang. Published "Han Poems" and "Er Ya Shu".　 [Ancient Tang Yun] Quoting "Shi Yu" and "Shi" in "The Poetry", Ye Qusheng, Yinao, and Shu, Jujube, and Rice are the same rhymes.
Juan
